answers.author: Shirley Hughes
answers.text:
Most facilities and show grounds require proof of  current coggins check before being allowed on the grouds. Suggest you contact a local large animal vet as to how best to handle an outbreak if it were to occur. Hope this helps.

author: Dan Mahon
text: COGGINS disease. What policies are typically used to monitor it and how would an out break be handled?
title: Equestrian Facility Management Policy
